## Exercises WS 5

Regionalize Germany's climates. 

- Use Worldclim versus CMIP data
- Use the upper helper functions and code for Great Britain



### Addon
::: {.callout-tip appearance="minimal"}
- Make sure you get an idea of a "scientific" [climate zoning concept](https://www.metoffice.gov.uk/weather/climate/climate-explained/climate-zones).

- The following links provide an initial random selection of some thoughts on this concept. 
  - [Climate Extremes are Becoming More Frequent, Co-occurring, and Persistent in Europe](https://link.springer.com/article/10.1007/s44177-022-00022-4?fromPaywallRec=false)
  - [A systematic review of GIS-based local climate zone mapping studies](https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S0360132321001980?via%3Dihub)
  - [European summer weather regimes 1990-2019: Automatic classification and representation in a small - global climate model ensemble](https://arxiv.org/abs/2409.16988)
- What are the main aims of the following articles in relation to climate zones?
- How do you assess the proposed solution using supercells etc. in comparison? 

- Use the [LCZ-generator](https://lcz-generator.rub.de/) and compare it to your results. 

:::
